start.Name: Buster
start.Text: (into recorder) Contract ID 734-B. Target: One ghost. Timer: 5 minutes. Rumors say the house gets... weird after that.

1.Name: Buster
1.Text: Get in. Tag the ghost. Get out. Easy money. Unless the house eats me. Ha. Just kidding. Mostly.

2.Name: Boo
2.Text: Okay okay okay—five minutes. I just have to stay hidden for five minutes. No pressure.

3.Name: Boo
3.Text: Hey House, remember our deal? No sudden wall shifting, no trap tantrums, and *definitely* no hallway illusions.

4.Name: Boo
4.Text: If I get sucked into that ridiculous ghost vacuum of his, I am *so* doomed.

5.Name: Boo
5.Text: Sorry House, I know you don't like noise... but if someone *accidentally* sets off a few things, that’s really on them, right?

6.Name: Boo
6.Text: (whispers) I cut one wrong wire and now I’m the one getting hunted? Rude.
